mapper.select: SELECT tbgrantuser.id ,tbgrantuser.deleted ,tbgrantuser.process ,tbgrantuser.created_at as createdAt ,tbgrantuser.modified_at as modifiedAt ,tbgrantuser.title ,tbgrantuser.cate ,tbgrantuser.img ,tbgrantuser.content FROM tbgrantuser WHERE tbgrantuser.id = #{id}

SELECT tbgrantuser.id FROM tbgrantuser WHERE tbgrantuser.id is not NULL AND tbgrantuser.deleted = #{deleted} AND tbgrantuser.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%') AND tbgrantuser.cate = #{cate} ORDER BY tbgrantuser.created_at ORDER BY tbgrantuser.title ASC DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{perpage}
